titlStmt.titl: Dewey Mitchell: Session at La Conner, WA, recorded by Vi Hilbert and Thom Hess

citation.biblCit: Mitchell, Dewey; Hilbert, Vi; Hess, Thom, 2014, "Dewey Mitchell: Session at La Conner, WA, recorded by Vi Hilbert and Thom Hess", https://doi.org/10.7939/DVN/10135, UAL Dataverse, V1

titlStmt.titl: Dewey Mitchell: Session at La Conner, WA, recorded by Vi Hilbert and Thom Hess

stdyInfo.abstract:
Contents:

Dewey Mitchell (8/21/71): Session at La Conner, WA, recorded by Vi Hilbert and Thom Hess. Program has been divided into 8 tracks:

  • Tr. 1 – (8:17) (Beginning Tape Side A)
  • Tr. 2 – (8:25)
  • Tr. 3 – (9:45)
  • Tr. 4 – (5:57)
  • Tr. 5 – (8:17) (Beginning Tape Side B)
  • Tr. 6 – (7:17)
  • Tr. 7 – (7:03)
  • Tr. 8 – (9:48)


From the Thom Hess Collection, Ethnomusicology Archives (UWEA 95-19.29) Un iversity of Washington, Seattle

useStmt.specPerm: Permission must be granted before access to recordings, transcripts and translations is made possible. Permission can be requested from Dr. David Beck (dbeck@ualberta.ca) or by clicking on the request permission link beside the file download button.
